Package CAMs_App.service

Class DatabaseService

java.lang.Object
CAMs_App.service.DatabaseService
public class DatabaseService extends Object
The DatabaseService class provides methods to reading and writing of data into CSV file for student,staff and camp entities

      public static boolean checkCampName(String campName, String userID)
      Check if staff user is responsible of a given camp
      Parameters:
      campName - : Name of camp to check
      userID - : Staff user's userID to check
      Returns:
